Name: PIGGY: Hunt
About the game: 'The PIGGY universe expands with PIGGY: HUNT, a multiplayer adventure where survivors team up to escape the wrath of the Infected, the monstrosity trying to hunt them down. Survivors Survivors complete tasks, solve puzzles, find and use tools to help one another survive and escape! Infected Infected use traps and all of your senses to hunt down the Survivors! Features: • Fast-paced fun for up to 6 players; more players available with custom-game mode! • Highly customizable characters, weapons, and items. • Use custom-game mode to create endless playable options. • 3 House maps to play, each with different mechanics to win. • Officially licensed game from MiniToon.
Meta Title: PIGGY: Hunt: Oct 14, 2021, Shaggy Doge and Full Overview
